[ build: x86 ]
make clean;make distclean
export NDK=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/ndk/26.1.10909125
export TOOLCHAIN=$NDK/toolchains/llvm/prebuilt/linux-x86_64
export API=26
export TARGET=x86_64-linux-android
export CC=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/i686-linux-android$API-clang
export CXX=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/i686-linux-android$API-clang++
./configure --prefix=./android/x86 \
--exec-prefix=./android/x86 \
--disable-cli \
--enable-static \
--enable-pic \
--disable-asm \
--host=x86-linux \
--sysroot="$TOOLCHAIN"/sysroot

make;make install


[ build: x86_64 ]
make clean;make distclean
export NDK=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/ndk/26.1.10909125
export TOOLCHAIN=$NDK/toolchains/llvm/prebuilt/linux-x86_64
export API=26
export TARGET=x86_64-linux-android
export CC=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/x86_64-linux-android$API-clang
export CXX=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/x86_64-linux-android$API-clang++
OPTIMIZE_CFLAGS="-march=$CPU -msse4.2 -mpopcnt -m64 -mtune=intel"
./configure --prefix=./android/x86-64 \
--exec-prefix=./android/x86-64 \
--disable-cli \
--enable-static \
--enable-pic \
--host=x86_64-linux \
--sysroot="$TOOLCHAIN"/sysroot

make;make install


[ build: armeabi-v7a ]
make clean;make distclean
export NDK=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/ndk/26.1.10909125
export TOOLCHAIN=$NDK/toolchains/llvm/prebuilt/linux-x86_64
export API=26
export TARGET=arm-linux
export CC=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/armv7a-linux-androideabi$API-clang
export CXX=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/armv7a-linux-androideabi$API-clang++
export CFLAGS="-fPIE -fPIC"
export LDFLAGS="-pie"
export EXTRA_CFLAGS="-mfloat-abi=softfp -mfpu=neon"
./configure --prefix=./android/armeabi-v7a \
--exec-prefix=./android/armeabi-v7a \
--disable-cli \
--enable-static \
--enable-pic \
--disable-asm \
--host=arm-linux \
--sysroot="$TOOLCHAIN"/sysroot

make;make install
